subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Richard Gasquet of France beat Jonas Bjorkman, 6-4, 6-3, to win the Red Letter Days Open in Nottingham, England, the first player to defend his title at this Wimbledon warm-up.
snippet: Richard Gasquet of France beat Jonas Bjorkman, 6-4, 6-3, to win the Red Letter Days Open in Nottingham, England, the first player to defend his title at this Wimbledon warm-up.
